name: Renewal Reminders
author: StorePro

sections.description:
Subscriptions Renewal Reminders Plugin

Subscriptions Renewal Reminders allows you to send your subscribers a Renewal notifications by Emails X days before their subscription ends. This plugin only works with WooCommerce Subscriptions plugin.
Renewal reminders are only sent to active subscribers. Emails will not be sent to customers whos subscription is On hold or Suspended.
Install this plugin and make sure your customers have not forgotten the subscriptions!

Features of Subscriptions Renewal Reminders

  • Enable/Disable the option for sending e-mails.
  • Days prior to sending your renewal email option.
  • Option to enter email subject.
  • Option to enter email content via Wysiwyg editor.
  • Automatic sending of e-mails with the help of wp-cron job.

What the Premium Version offers

Renewal Reminder Pro Plugin offers much more exciting options that could be included on sending reminder emails. Get the premium version now!

Premium Features

ðŸ‘‰Type of Subscription – The ability to choose the type of subscription period renewal reminder emails are sent to. This is useful for websites with mixed subscription periods, as you can avoid sending renewal reminders for subscriptions that donâ€™t actually need them.

ðŸ‘‰Renewal Periods – Renewal period can be chosen from the available options which is daily, weekly, monthly or yearly.

ðŸ‘‰Updating Fields – The ability to change the from email address and the senderâ€™s name for renewal reminder emails.

ðŸ‘‰Shortcodes – Additional shortcodes are included for email templates, such as the total amount, subscription link, and my account link.

ðŸ‘‰Test Email – An email test feature has been included.

ðŸ‘‰Filters – Additional filters that allow you to expand the pluginâ€™s functionality and customize email templates. You can also use these filters to modify the subscription period.
sections.changelog:
1.3.1 – 2024-08-14

  • Tested with WooCommerce 9.1.4, WordPress 6.6.1, and PHP version 8.2.
  • Minor styling adjustments.

1.3.0 – 2024-07-17

  • Implemented Language translation functionality.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 9.1.2, WordPress 6.6, and PHP version 8.2.

1.2.1 – 2024-06-14

  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.9.3 and WordPress 6.5.4.

1.2.0 – 2024-01-09

  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.4.0 and WordPress 6.4.2.
  • Fix on admin notice which gets displayed on page reload.

1.1.9 – 2023-10-25

  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.2.1 and WooCommerce Subscriptions 5.6.0.
  • Tested Compatibility with HPOS Mode.

1.1.8 – 2023-10-20

  • Updated plugin settings page with advertisement and added a notice for adding a review.
  • Updated style with submenu.
  • Tested with WordPress 6.3.2, WooCommerce 8.2.0, and WooCommerce Subscriptions 5.3.0.

1.1.7 – 2023-09-21

  • Updated the info regarding the premium features on the back-end.
  • Tested with WordPress 6.3.1 and WooCommerce 8.1.1.

1.1.6 – 2023-08-01

  • Minor change in the main plugin file.

1.1.5 – 2023-07-25

  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.9.0 and WordPress 6.2.2.

1.1.4 – 2023-05-02

  • Bug fixed in the email send out for on-hold subscription status.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.6.1 and WordPress 6.2.

1.1.3 – 2023-02-22

  • Bug fixed in the email send out for pending-canceled subscription status.
  • Some minor style changes.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.4.0 and WordPress 6.1.1.

1.1.2 – 2022-12-22

  • Bug fixed in the email send out functionality.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 7.2.0 and WordPress 6.1.1.

1.1.1 – 2022-08-25

  • Shortcodes created to add the subscriber’s First Name and Last Name individually.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 6.8.2.

1.1.0 – 2022-08-16

  • Email template base, background colors adjusted.
  • Renewal date in the template formatted.
  • Tested with WooCommerce 6.8.0.

1.0.9 – 2022-08-05

  • Email template style changes.
  • Date formatted.
  • Fixed tooltip glitch in Admin setting Page.

1.0.8 – 2022-07-20

  • Included base colors in the email template.
  • Renewal email styled as default WooCommerce emails.

1.0.7 – 2022-07-13

  • Option to choose text, body, and background colors from WooCommerce email settings added.
  • Configured to get “from” address in the email as of website admin.
  • Tested with WordPress 6.0.1 and WooCommerce 6.7.0.

1.0.6 – 2022-06-30

  • WYSIWYG Editor issue fixed.
  • HTML entities appearing in email contents fixed.
  • Tested with WordPress 6.0 and WooCommerce 6.6.1.

1.0.5 – 2022-06-09

  • Licensing/Trademark Violation fixed.
  • Tested with WordPress 5.9 and WooCommerce 6.4.1.
  • Email template color missing on title fixed.
  • Data sanitization and escaping made to input variables.
  • Activation message conflict fixed.

1.0.4 – 2022-02-04

  • Introduced Manual Sync feature for data update.
  • Changed layout and styles.
  • Auto-update data on subscription status change.
  • Scheduled event trigger updated.
  • Tested with WordPress 5.9 and WooCommerce 6.1.1.

1.0.3 – 2021-11-24

  • Bug fixes on email send out.

1.0.2 – 2021-11-16

  • Added HTML Editor in admin panel.
  • Some style changes.
  • Removed footer brand name and link.

1.0.1 – 2021-10-30

  • Tested with WordPress 5.8.1 and WooCommerce 5.8.0.

1.0.0 – 2021-05-14

  • Tested with WordPress 5.7.2 and WooCommerce 5.3.0.

short_description: Renewal Reminders for Subscriptions, automatically send your subscribers a courtesy reminder via email X days before their subscription renews.
